message: The FDA is aware of emerging supply issues with the medication. We encourage manufacturers and healthcare providers to report any disruptions and collaborate for swift resolution.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging but current supply is adequate. The market stability is disrupted due to a single manufacturer issue, and coordination could preempt escalation.', 'intervention_justification': 'A monitoring statement is appropriate to acknowledge the situation without causing panic. It promotes transparency and encourages stakeholder coordination.', 'market_impact_prediction': 'Manufacturers may be prompted to evaluate and adjust capacity, while buyers are reassured and discouraged from stockpiling.', 'patient_safety_considerations': 'With low to moderate patient safety risk currently, this approach maintains vigilance without risking panic-induced shortages.'}

message: The FDA is currently monitoring an emerging drug shortage. We encourage healthcare providers, manufacturers, and distributors to coordinate and report any supply disruptions. Our goal is to ensure patient needs are met and prevent further escalation.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with existing supply inadequacy and market disruption.', 'intervention_justification': 'Issuing an alert will prompt better coordination among stakeholders without causing unnecessary panic buying.', 'market_impact_prediction': 'Manufacturers may increase efforts to expand capacity, while buyers will likely avoid hoarding due to the moderated message.', 'patient_safety_considerations': 'Moderate patient safety risk justifies taking action to mitigate access issues before they become critical.'}
